name: Keep Sheep
description:
The newest popular match 3 game Keep Sheep is coming! Compete with players from all over the world! Challenge super difficult puzzle!

Only 0.1% of the players can solve the puzzle and clear the level! It is said that the IQ of those who clear the level is as high as that of Einstein! Come and challenge yourself!

How to play Keep Sheep:
There is a groove below, a total of 7 blocks can be placed in the groove.
Match three tiles with the same pattern. Clicking on tiles automatically places them in the groove below. When there are 3 tiles of the same pattern in the groove, they will be automatically eliminated.
*Note: Up to 7 moves can be used to remove three tiles with the same pattern in each round! If the groove is full of tiles, it means you fail. Every step matters!
Tiles will have many layers. Only after the tiles on the upper layer are eliminated, the blocks on the lower layer can be eliminated.
When there are no tiles on the grass, you have successfully cleared the level!

Keep Sheep FEATURES
Easy match - Challenge your brain through thousands of mahjong puzzles. classic elimination gameplay. The low difficulty level at the beginning will help you quickly get started, and then puzzles will become challenging! Are you ready?
Super difficult puzzle - Only 0.1% of players can clear the level! Will you be one of them? Come and challenge yourself!
New levels every day - A new level is released every day. The difficulty of the level is random, don't give up, the next Einstein is you!
Compete with global users - the leaderboard will display the number of players who pass the level in each region, quickly pass the level to occupy the top of the leaderboard, and win the title of "The King of all sheep"!
Various cute skins - Clear levels to win various skins! More cute free skins are waiting for you!

Come and play, the next Einstein is you! Start your Keep Sheep adventure now!
